articles.title: Colombo Weather Today: Hourly Update Of India vs Pakistan Asia Cup Super 4 Clash - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Pakistan Asia Cup match on Monday will resume at 3 pm IST. However, there continues to remain threat over the completion of full 100-over contest.
articles.content: After the group match between India and Pakistan was washed out, intermittent rain pushed the Asia Cup Super 4 clash between the two teams to a reserve day on Sunday. India were 147 for two in 24.1 o… [+2178 chars]

articles.title: Asia stocks start the week mostly lower, ahead of key data from China and India this week - CNBC
articles.description: India's inflation data will be out Tuesday, while China will release industrial output, home sale prices, and retail sales on Friday.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets were mixed at the start of a week where key economic data from major economies will take center stage.
